column7: Measure(s) to reach compliance needed for UWWTP
column8: Load entering the UWWTP at the expected date of compliance (as planned)
column11: Date or expected date of completion of preparatory measures (planning, design, etc)
column12: Date or expected start date for works
column13: Date or expected date of completion of works
column14: Expected date of compliance (12 months of samples)
column15: Forecast cost investment needed for the UWWTP (as in the national plan)
column16: Name of EU fund planned to be used  (if any)

column6: Povečana obremenitev, čistilna naprava ne obratuje v skladu s predpisi - je brez terciarne obravnave.
column7: V okviru projekta Odvajanje in čiščenje odpadne vode v porečju Zgornje Save - Izgradnja kanalizacije in nadgradnja ter rekonstrukcija centralne čistilne naprave Jesenice (Odločba organa upravljanja za pomoč iz Kohezijskega sklada EU KS OP ROPI/5/1/Gorki 1. sklop/0 z dne 12.07.2012) bo realizirana gradnja čistilne naprave s kapaciteto 30.000 PE.
